name: atomic minifridge
description: A very small fridge for keeping food cool.  Provides some insulation from outside weather. Powered by an internal reactor, it doesnt need to be connected to vehicle power to work.

name: atomic minifreezer
description: Compact version of a chest freezer, designed as a mobile solution for freezing food.  Provides insulation from the elements. Doesnt require power on account of its own internal power.
